item.title: Gift of Chaos
item.fluff: Unpredictability dogs your steps, and you never know when chaos will play a part in your destiny

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou roll a natural 1 or natural 20 on an attack roll or saving throw
EffectRoll a d6 to determine the effect:
1. Forceful ChaosClose burst 1 (each creature in the burst); You must push each target. Roll a 1d4 for each creature to determine how many squares you push it.
2. Confounding ChaosChoose one creature within 10 squares of you. You and the chosen creature are dazed until the end of your next turn.
3. Maddening Chaos (Psychic)Close burst 1 (each enemy in the burst); Each target takes 2d10 psychic damage.
4. Swapping Chaos (Teleportation)Close burst 1 (you and each creature in the burst); Each can teleport up to 1d6 squares as a free reaction.
5. Warping ChaosClose burst 2 (each enemy in the burst); Each target is slowed (save ends).
6. Inciting ChaosEach ally within 5 squares of you can shift up to 2 squares as a free reaction.

item.title: Gift of Fire
item.fluff: Your complexion assumes a ruddy hue, reflecting your inner fire

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 fire.
Level 16Resist 10 fire.
Level 26Resist 15 fire.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect Melee touch (one weapon you are wielding); Until the end of your next turn, attacks you make with the target weapon deal an additional 1d6 fire damage.
Level 16Additional 2d6 fire damage.
Level 26Additional 3d6 fire damage.

item.title: Gift of Flame
item.fluff: Hearing the call of elemental fire, you vanish and reappear in a flash of flames

block.name: Property
block.line: Your Fire attacks ignore 3 points of resist fire.
Level 17Ignore 6 points.
Level 27Ignore 10 points.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerA creature within 10 squares of you takes fire damage
EffectClose burst 1 (each enemy in the burst); Each target takes 1d6 fire damage.
Level 172d6 fire damage.
Level 273d8 fire damage.
You teleport up to 10 squares to a space adjacent to the triggering creature.

item.title: Gift of Rain
item.fluff: You drink your fill from a tranquil oasis, and healing pours from you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 5 (you and each ally in the burst); Each target can either make a saving throw against an effect that a save can end, or spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

item.title: Gift of the Sea
item.fluff: The harder an enemy tries to move you, the harder you move the enemy

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy pulls, pushes, or slides you
EffectClose burst 10 (the triggering enemy in the burst); You push the target a number of squares equal to the triggering forced movement.

item.title: Gift of Stone
item.fluff: A sudden transformation into stone protects you from an attack and adds power to your next strike

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou take damage
EffectYou become petrified until the start of your next turn. While petrified, you are unconscious and have resist 20 all.
AftereffectThe first enemy you hit with a melee attack before the end of your current turn is knocked prone.

item.title: Gift of Thirsting Salt
item.fluff: Eerie white crystals suspended within your body surface to absorb the blood you spill in combat, then heal you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit and damage an enemy with an attack
EffectYou regain 10 hit points, or 20 hit points if the triggering attack was a critical hit.
Level 16Regain 15 or 30 hit points, respectively.
Level 26Regain 25 or 50 hit points, respectively.

item.title: Servant of the Silt Sea
item.fluff: You call forth a silt elemental, keeping it under your control for a short while

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectRanget 5; You summon a Small lesser silt elemental in an unoccupied space within range.
Level 15A Medium silt elemental.
Level 25A Large greater silt elemental.
The silt elemental remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the silt elemental is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

item.title: Spirit of Sand
item.fluff: Calling forth the desert's power, you produce a short-lived blast of screaming wind and biting sand

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack
EffectClose burst 1; The burst creates a zone of biting winds and sand until the end of your next turn.
Level 12Close burst 2.
Level 22Close burst 3.
Squares within the zone are lightly obscured, and you can use the following action at-will:
Free Interrupt: Trigger: A creature starts its turn in the zone; You slide the triggering creature 1 square.

item.title: Spirit of Storm
item.fluff: Primordial lightning erupts from your enemy, and thunder booms all around

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 lightning and resist 5 thunder.
Level 15Resist 10 lightning and resist 10 thunder.
Level 25Resist 15 lightning and resist 15 thunder.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a melee attack or ranged attack
EffectThe triggering enemy takes 2d6 lightning damage, and each enemy adjacent to the triggering enemy takes 1d6 thunder damage.
Level 153d6 lightning damage, and 2d6 thunder damage.
Level 254d6 lightning damage, and each enemy within 2 squares of the triggering enemy takes 3d6 thunder damage.

item.title: Spirit of Wind
item.fluff: The fury of the elemental maelstorm manifests around you when you call forth its power

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 1; The burst creates a zone of whirling elements until the end of your next turn.
Level 13Close burst 2.
Level 23Close burst 3.
The zone is difficult terrain, or greater difficult terrain for flying creatures. Creatures in the zone gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses.
